name: Read Clock Time
description:
Everyone knows the dial of a mechanical watch, but sometimes the position of the hands makes you wonder!?

The quiz contains questions about the time indicated on the dial of a huge mechanical clock. The game contains more than 200 riddles of varying complexity — ranging from the location of the arrows with a difference of one hour, and up to 5 minutes!

The player must choose a single correct answer out of several choices. One coin is given for a correct answer, but if the player hesitates or makes a mistake, two coins are taken! As the level increases, the player has less and less time to answer, and the cost of an error increases!
